Posts.Content: May 3, 2017 03:43AM Strong4mom_57 wrote: Thank you for your reply you all give me HOPE. I will keep you all in my prayers. The statistics online are so grim, i believe my mom and I need to stop reading as your stories are so positive. I am most grateful and happy to hear your stories. I really pray the find a cure for this disease. I am currently toying with the idea of removing my boobs and everything, but i dont have children yet. My prayers are with all of you.
Posts.Title: Brain mets after 2 years NED... Positive stories please Strong4mom_57 Strong4mom_57

Posts.Content: May 9, 2017 05:43PM Strong4mom_57 wrote: Hi, My mom completed WBRT about a month now she too has clogged ears and was told it would go away. She also did 5. Some other side effects that she experienced. 1. She feels like she is walking on the moon 2. Her head feels a bit heavy (like her brain is too big for the skull) 3. Tired not as energetic as before especially as she is no longer on steroids 4. Vision is slightly blurry, however, this is improving Generally she does not quite feel like herself and it makes her a bit frustrated and she is active. I have spoken to other people who went through this ordeal and they all confirmed that they improved over time.
Posts.Title: Side effects of brain radiation Eljaywest Eljaywest
